languages.text: "Одумайтесь, {name}! Каждому образованному дворянину известны истории о кровавых последствиях, постигших Вольных Торговцев Баластия Ирема, Рафа Лонгиния и Эдварда Маиссуса в пятом столетии сего тысячелетия. Не ступайте по их кровавым стопам!"

traits.locale_text: "Одумайтесь, {name}! Каждому образованному дворянину известны истории о кровавых последствиях, постигших Вольных Торговцев Баластия Ирема, Рафа Лонгиния и Эдварда Маиссуса в пятом столетии сего тысячелетия. Не ступайте по их кровавым стопам!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"
languages.original_text: "Одумайтесь, {name}! Каждому образованному дворянину известны истории о кровавых последствиях, постигших Вольных Торговцев Баластия Ирема, Рафа Лонгиния и Эдварда Маиссуса в пятом столетии сего тысячелетия. Не ступайте по их кровавым стопам!"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Each educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「今一度よくお考えください、{name}様！教養のある貴族であれば、この千年紀の5世紀にバラスティア・イレム、ラス・ロンギヌス、そしてエドワード・マイススといった自由開拓者がどのような恐ろしい結末を迎えたのかをご存じのはず。彼らの血に染まった道を進んではなりません！」
languages.original_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"

traits.locale_text: 「今一度よくお考えください、{name}様！教養のある貴族であれば、この千年紀の5世紀にバラスティア・イレム、ラス・ロンギヌス、そしてエドワード・マイススといった自由開拓者がどのような恐ろしい結末を迎えたのかをご存じのはず。彼らの血に染まった道を進んではなりません！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Conténgase, {name}! Todo noble educado conoce las sangrientas consecuencias sufridas por los Comerciantes Independientes Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus y Edward Maissus en el quinto siglo de este milenio. ¡No siga sus ensangrentados pasos!».
languages.original_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Conténgase, {name}! Todo noble educado conoce las sangrientas consecuencias sufridas por los Comerciantes Independientes Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus y Edward Maissus en el quinto siglo de este milenio. ¡No siga sus ensangrentados pasos!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “要三思而后行，{name}！任何知书达理的贵族，都应该铭记这个千年第五世纪的行商浪人巴拉斯提亚·艾伦、拉瑟·朗吉努斯，以及爱德华·麦修斯的血腥厄运！前车之鉴，勿蹈覆辙！”
languages.original_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"

traits.locale_text: “要三思而后行，{name}！任何知书达理的贵族，都应该铭记这个千年第五世纪的行商浪人巴拉斯提亚·艾伦、拉瑟·朗吉努斯，以及爱德华·麦修斯的血腥厄运！前车之鉴，勿蹈覆辙！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous devriez y réfléchir à deux fois, {name} ! Tout noble ayant reçu une éducation digne de ce nom connaît le sort sanglant qu'ont subi les libres-marchands Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus et Edward Maissus au cinquième siècle de notre millénaire. Ne vous engagez pas sur la même voie ! »
languages.original_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez y réfléchir à deux fois, {name} ! Tout noble ayant reçu une éducation digne de ce nom connaît le sort sanglant qu'ont subi les libres-marchands Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus et Edward Maissus au cinquième siècle de notre millénaire. Ne vous engagez pas sur la même voie ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Besinnt Euch, {name}! Jeder gebildete Adlige weiß von den blutigen Konsequenzen, welche im fünften Jahrhundert dieses Millenniums die Freihändler Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus und Edward Maissus befielen. Tretet nicht in ihre blutigen Fußstapfen!"
languages.original_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"

traits.locale_text: "Besinnt Euch, {name}! Jeder gebildete Adlige weiß von den blutigen Konsequenzen, welche im fünften Jahrhundert dieses Millenniums die Freihändler Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus und Edward Maissus befielen. Tretet nicht in ihre blutigen Fußstapfen!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kendine gel {name}! Bu binyılın beşinci yüzyılında Balastia İrem, Rath Longinus ve Edward Maissus adlı Hür Tacirlerin başına gelenleri duymayan tahsilli soylu yoktur. Onların kanlı yolundan gitme sakın!"
languages.original_text: "Bethink yourself, {name}! Every educated nobleman knows of the bloody consequences that befell the Rogue Traders Balastia Irem, Rath Longinus, and Edward Maissus in the fifth century of this millennium. Do not follow in their blood-stained footsteps!"
